description: Template for training question classification model
instructions: Label questions with their type. You'll need 50-200 examples for good performance.

question_types.applied: Examples, real-life use, 'how does X work in practice?'
question_types.crisis: Urgent mental health concerns requiring professional help

examples.question: Can you give me an example of how CBT is used to treat anxiety?
I've been feeling really anxious lately and I don't know what to do
Can you explain more about what you just said?
I'm having thoughts of hurting myself

future_ml_models.svm: Good for small datasets, can handle non-linear patterns
future_ml_models.bert_finetuned: Best accuracy, requires more data and compute

training_notes: Current implementation uses rule-based classification. To train ML models, convert this JSON to a format suitable for scikit-learn or transformers library.
